SELECT finance.categoryname ,finance.financeid , IFNULL(landbuilding.unitprice,'0')unitprice , IFNULL(landbuilding.state,'1')state
from finance
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * from landbuilding
where landbuilding.userid = (SELECT userid from house where house.houseid = #{houseid}) and landbuilding.buildingid = (SELECT buildingid from house where house.houseid = #{houseid})
)landbuilding on landbuilding.financeid = finance.financeid
where finance.financeid in (19,20,21,22,23)

SELECT house.houseid , house.house_number , IFNULL(historymeter.`aftercount`,'0')`aftercount` , IFNULL(historymeter.`beforecount`,'0')`beforecount`, historymeter.financeid, historymeter.update_time FROM house LEFT JOIN ( SELECT historymeter.`aftercount` `beforecount` , '0' `aftercount` ,historymeter.update_time ,historymeter.houseid, historymeter.financeid from historymeter
where historymeter.financeid = #{financeid} and historymeter.historymeterid in ( SELECT MAX(historymeterid) from historymeter GROUP BY houseid , financeid ) ) historymeter on historymeter.houseid = house.houseid where house.houseid in ( SELECT DISTINCT housepay.houseid from housepay LEFT JOIN house on house.houseid = housepay.houseid where housepay.paystate=1 and house.user_id = #{userid} ) and house.buildingid = #{buildingid}
and ( historymeter.update_time < (select date_add(curdate(),interval -day(curdate())+1 day)) or historymeter.update_time is null )
and historymeter.update_time >=(select date_add(curdate(),interval -day(curdate())+1 day))

SELECT building.building , building.buildingid , village.villagename from building LEFT JOIN village on building.villageid = village.villageid where building.buildingid in ( SELECT DISTINCT house.buildingid from house where house.houseid in ( SELECT DISTINCT housepay.houseid from housepay LEFT JOIN house on house.houseid = housepay.houseid where housepay.paystate=1 and house.user_id = #{userid} ) ) and building.buildingid in ( SELECT DISTINCT buildingid from landbuilding where landbuilding.userid = #{userid} and landbuilding.state = 1) ORDER BY village.villageid

SELECT landbuilding.financeid , finance.categoryname from landbuilding LEFT JOIN finance on finance.financeid = landbuilding.financeid where landbuilding.userid =#{userid} and landbuilding.buildingid =#{buildingid} and landbuilding.state = 2

SELECT * from landbuilding where landbuilding.financeid = #{financeid} and landbuilding.buildingid = (SELECT buildingid from house where house.houseid = #{houseid}) and landbuilding.userid = (SELECT userid from house where house.houseid = #{houseid} )

SELECT COUNT(1)count , building.buildingid ,building.building ,village.villagename from historymeter LEFT JOIN house on historymeter.houseid = house.houseid LEFT JOIN building on house.buildingid = building.buildingid LEFT JOIN village on village.villageid = building.villageid where historymeter.state = 1 and house.user_id = #{userid} and building.buildingid in ( SELECT DISTINCT buildingid from landbuilding where landbuilding.userid = #{userid} and landbuilding.state = 1 ) GROUP BY building.buildingid

SELECT historymeter.beforecount ,historymeter.aftercount , finance.categoryname ,historymeter.update_time , `profile`.real_name realname , house.house_number , house.user_id userid , historymeter.financeid , historymeter.historymeterid, house.houseid from historymeter LEFT JOIN finance on finance.financeid = historymeter.financeid LEFT JOIN `profile` on `profile`.user_id = historymeter.userid LEFT JOIN house on house.houseid = historymeter.houseid where historymeter.houseid in ( SELECT houseid from house where buildingid = #{buildingid} and user_id = #{userid} )
and historymeter.financeid = #{financeid} and historymeter.state = 1 order by house.houseid , historymeter.update_time desc

SELECT * from payexpert where payexpert.payexpertid in ( SELECT DISTINCT payexpert.payexpertid from payexpert LEFT JOIN housepay on payexpert.payexpertid = housepay.payexpertid LEFT JOIN usercent on usercent.usercentid = housepay.usercentid where usercent.houseid = #{houseid} and usercent.centstate = 1 ) ORDER BY payexpert.end_time asc

SELECT historymeter.aftercount , historymeter.beforecount , historymeter.update_time , historymeter.historymeterid , historymeter.houseid, `profile`.real_name realname , finance.categoryname , his.real_name centname , hydcoal.unitprice from historymeter LEFT JOIN `profile` on historymeter.userid = `profile`.user_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT usercent.houseid , `profile`.real_name from usercent LEFT JOIN `profile` on usercent.userid = `profile`.user_id where usercent.houseid = (SELECT houseid from historymeter where historymeterid = #{historymeterid}) ) his on his.houseid = historymeter.houseid LEFT JOIN usercent on usercent.userid = `profile`.user_id and historymeter.houseid = usercent.houseid LEFT JOIN finance on finance.financeid = historymeter.financeid LEFT JOIN hydcoal on hydcoal.houseid = historymeter.houseid and hydcoal.financeid = historymeter.financeid where historymeter.historymeterid = #{historymeterid}

SELECT house.house_number , IFNULL(`profile`.real_name,house.house_number)realname, `user`.telephone , house.houseid , house.buildingid, housepay.start_time date , house.floor, housepay.centprices yajin , area.`name` trading ,village.villagename ,building.building from house LEFT JOIN usercent on house.houseid = usercent.houseid and usercent.centstate not in (3,4) LEFT JOIN `profile` on usercent.userid = `profile`.user_id LEFT JOIN `user` on `user`.userid = `profile`.user_id LEFT JOIN building on house.buildingid = building.buildingid LEFT JOIN village on building.villageid = village.villageid LEFT JOIN area on area.`code` = village.`code` INNER JOIN ( SELECT housepay.houseid ,housepay.centprices , payexpert.start_time from housepay LEFT JOIN payexpert on housepay.payexpertid = payexpert.payexpertid LEFT JOIN usercent on housepay.usercentid = usercent.usercentid where payexpert.start_time >= #{start} and payexpert.start_time <=#{end} and usercent.centstate not in (3,4) and housepay.financeid = 29 ) housepay on housepay.houseid = house.houseid where house.user_id = #{userid} ORDER BY house.buildingid ,house.house_number asc
limit #{pagequery.pagestart} , #{pagequery.pagesize}

SELECT finance.financeid ,finance.categoryname , housepay.centprices from housepay LEFT JOIN payexpert on housepay.payexpertid = payexpert.payexpertid LEFT JOIN finance on housepay.financeid = finance.financeid where housepay.houseid = #{houseid} and housepay.financeid !=30 and payexpert.start_time >= #{start} and payexpert.start_time <=#{end}

SELECT * from historymeter where historymeter.financeid = #{financeid} and historymeter.houseid =#{houseid} and historymeter.state = 2 AND month(historymeter.update_time) = month(curdate()) and year(historymeter.update_time) = year(curdate())

SELECT * from historymeter where historymeter.houseid = #{houseid} and historymeter.state !=3 and month(historymeter.update_time) = month(curdate()) and year(historymeter.update_time) = year(curdate())
SELECT MIN(code)code from area where name like CONCAT('%',#{city},'%') and `level` <3
